<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->



<!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->

<!-- End licensee_global_navigation -->
       <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_top_banner.html -->

          <tr data-ng-repeat="team in conferenceData.teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="rank" data-ng-class="{rankClinchedDivision: false, rankClinchedDivision: false, rankEliminated: false}">{{ team.standings.confRank || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="team-name"><span class="team-standing-logo"><img data-ng-src="/media/img/teams/logos/{{ team.profile.abbr}}_logo.svg"></span><span class="clinched-icon">{{ team.standings.clinched }} </span><a data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}" sib-team-urls team="team.profile"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.wins || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.losses || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Standings -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winPct | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.confGamesBehind | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.confWin  | number:0}} - {{ team.standings.confLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.divWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.divLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.homeWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.homeLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.roadWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.roadLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==4)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Streaks -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.homeStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.roadStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.loseStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Home || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Road || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Margin -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.score100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.score100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.oppover500Win || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppover500Loss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctwin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctloss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInRebWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInRebLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Ahead -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsFor | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsAgainst | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsDiff | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>

        <tbody data-ng-show="tabbed=='division'" data-ng-repeat="division in divisionStandings[ conferenceIndex ].divisions">
          <tr class="caption">
            <td colspan="100%">
              <h6>{{ division.displayDivision }}</h6>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-ng-repeat="team in division.teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="rank" data-ng-class="{rankClinchedDivision: false, rankClinchedDivision: false, rankEliminated: false}">{{ team.standings.confRank || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="team-name"><span class="team-standing-logo"><img data-ng-src="/media/img/teams/logos/{{ team.profile.abbr}}_logo.svg"></span><span class="clinched-icon">{{ team.standings.clinched }} </span><a data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}" sib-team-urls team="team.profile"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.wins || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">{{ team.standings.losses || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Standings -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winPct | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.confGamesBehind | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.confWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.confLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.divWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.divLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.homeWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.homeLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.roadWin | number:0 }} - {{ team.standings.roadLoss | number:0 }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='standings' && (!paginate || currentpage==4)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Streaks -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.streak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.homeStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.roadStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.winStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.loseStreak || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Home || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='streaks' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.last10Road || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Margin -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==1)">{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.threePtsOrLessLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tenPtsOrMoreLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.score100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.score100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppscore100PlusLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.oppover500Win || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.oppover500Loss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctwin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInFgpctloss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.leadInRebWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.leadInRebLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='margin' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.fewerTurnoversLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>

            <!-- Ahead -->
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtHalfLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.aheadAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.behindAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="columnSet=='ahead' && (!paginate || currentpage==3)">{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdWin || '&mdash;' }}-{{ team.standings.tiedAtThirdLoss || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsFor | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsAgainst | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
            <td class="center" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4">{{ team.standings.pointsDiff | number:1 || '&mdash;' }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>


  <div class="table-footer" data-ng-show="!moduleLoading">
    <div class="pagination" data-ng-show="paginate">
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=2" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==2}"></a>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>

    <div class="col-sm-12">

    </div>

</header>
<script type="text/javascript">
        var MenuSelect = {

            initialize : function(itemSelected) {
                jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    var self = MenuSelect;
                    self._selectItemFromPageSection(itemSelected);
                });
            },
            
            _selectItemFromPageSection : function(item) {

                jQuery.each(jQuery(".main-nav__link"), function(index,obj) {

                    documentObjectModelAnchors = jQuery(obj);
                    var anchorText = documentObjectModelAnchors[0].innerHTML;
                    descricao = anchorText.toUpperCase();

                    descricao = descricao.replace("&", "E");
                    descricao = descricao.replace(/\s{1,}/g, '');
                    item = item.toUpperCase();


                    console.log(item);
                    console.log(descricao);

                    if (item == "VÍDEOS"){
                        item = "TVGQ";
                    }
                    
                    if(descricao == item) {
                        $(obj).parent().addClass( "main-nav__item--active" );
                    }
                })
            }
        };
</script>

    
        
            
                
                    <script>
                        $(document).ready(function(){
                            MenuSelect.initialize("HOME");
                        });
                    </script>

            <p class="materia-item__editoria">5 camisas para os dias quentes</p>
        </a>
    </article>
</div>


                        


<div class="slider__item">
    <article class="materia-item">
        <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Estilo/Manual/noticia/2016/09/24-pecas-para-ter-no-guarda-roupas-durante-primavera.html" title="24 essenciais de primavera">

            <p class="materia-item__editoria">24 essenciais de primavera</p>
        </a>
    </article>
</div>

    <article class="materia-item">
        <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Estilo/Moda-masculina/noticia/2016/10/esqueca-gravata-dicas-para-descontrair-alfaiataria-classica.html" title="Alfaiataria descontraída">
            <figure class="materia-item__thumb bg-cover" style="background-image: url('http://s2.glbimg.com/hFTei2U49UegWZGzcEgCb3xaRuM=/185x150/top/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2016/08/30/01_3.jpg');"></figure>
            <p class="materia-item__editoria">Alfaiataria descontraída</p>
        </a>
    </article>
</div>


                    </div>
                </div>

<script type="text/javascript">

        $(document).ready(function() {
            var url_prefix = '/dinamico/breaking_news/gq/widget_uuid/b2b160f1-2eae-4945-b87b-d26b274622eb/94a2467d-43f0-490e-a810-de1b237eb5ae/1490651273'

            
                var url_sufix = '/{{paginaAtual}}/{{qtdPorPaginas}}/?servico=gq2_plantao';
                var url = url_prefix + url_sufix;
            

            var configPaginacao = {
                paginaAtual: 1,
                qtdPorPaginas: 21,
                url: url
            }

            GQMaterias.init(true, configPaginacao);
        });

</script>



    




    

    
        
            <div id="widget-html-5726" class="widget-html ajuste-link-destaque-podio">
    
    <script>
$(".destaques--3 *").on("click", function(event){event.stopImmediatePropagation();})
$(".destaques--3").css({"cursor": "pointer"}).on("click", function(){window.open("http://gq.globo.com/GQ-no-podio/");});
</script>
</div>
        
    





    

    
    

    
    

    
        


<footer class="footer">
	
	    




    

    
        
            
	


    
	
    


    <section class="newsletter newsletter--big" style="background-image: url('http://s2.glbimg.com/odfW0Bd3gD5m1flKBz6rVj-AxOQ=/2560x670/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2016/06/16/news_home_4.jpg');">
        <div class="container" style="background-image:none">
            <figure class="newsletter__logo">
                <img src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/img/logo-gq-newsletter.png">
                <figcaption class="newsletter__logo__caption">RECEBA NOSSA NEWSLETTER</figcaption>
            </figure>
            <form class="newsletter__form" id="newsletter_form">
                <input type="checkbox" id="politica_privacidade" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: -20px;">
                <span class="assinatura__inferior__helper" style="font-size: 15px; position: absolute; left: 22px; bottom: 4px;">Li e concordo com a <a style="color:#000; font-weight: bold;" href="http://www.globo.com/privacidade.html" target="_blank">Política de Privacidade</a></span>
                <input type="email" name="email" id="newsletter_email" class="newsletter__form__campo" placeholder="Favor preencher o seu e-mail">
                <input type="submit" class="newsletter__form__btn" value="Ok">
            </form>
        </div>
        <style type="text/css">
        .newsletter .newsletter__form {
            position: relative;
        }
        </style>
        <script>
            function valida(email) {
                var filtro_mail = /([\w\-]+\@[\w\-]+\.[\w\-]+)/;
                if (!filtro_mail.test(email) || email == "") {
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.border = "1px solid #E32036";
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.color = "#E32036";
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").setAttribute('placeholder', "Favor preencher um e-mail válido!");
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").focus();
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }

            function valida_politica_privacidade(){
                if(!($('#politica_privacidade').is(":checked"))){
                    alert('Para inscrever-se a receber newsletters você deve aceitar a nossa política de privacidade')
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }

            $('#newsletter_form').submit(function (form) {
                var values = {};
                values['revista'] = '13';
                values['email'] = $('#newsletter_email').val();
                form.preventDefault();
                var valida_email = valida(values['email']);
                if ((valida_email) && (valida_politica_privacidade())){
                    $.post('/dinamico/newsletter/', values)
                            .done(function (data) {
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.border = "1px solid #005b2d";
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.color = "#005b2d";
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").value = '';
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").setAttribute('placeholder', "E-mail cadastrado com sucesso!");
                            });
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            });
        </script>
    </section>

        </figure>
        <span class="assinatura__helper">MOBILE</span>
    </a>

		</div>
	</div>
</section>

    <script>
  var dadosNavegg = {};

  if (typeof nvg13574 !== "undefined") {

    dadosNavegg.gender = nvg13574.getSegment("gender");
    dadosNavegg.age = nvg13574.getSegment("age");
    dadosNavegg.education = nvg13574.getSegment("education");
    dadosNavegg.marital = nvg13574.getSegment("marital");
    dadosNavegg.income = nvg13574.getSegment("income");
    dadosNavegg.interest = nvg13574.getSegment("interest");
    dadosNavegg.product = nvg13574.getSegment("product");
    dadosNavegg.brand = nvg13574.getSegment("brand");
    dadosNavegg.career = nvg13574.getSegment("career");
    dadosNavegg.country = nvg13574.getSegment("country");
    dadosNavegg.region = nvg13574.getSegment("region");
    dadosNavegg.city = nvg13574.getSegment("city");
    dadosNavegg.cluster = nvg13574.getSegment("cluster");

  }

  function getCookie(name) {
      var value = "; " + document.cookie;
      var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
      if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  }

  function getCADUNID() {

    var cadunId = getCookie('CADUN_ID');
    cadunId = cadunId.replace(/['"]+/g, '');
    
    return cadunId.substring(0, 10);

  }

  function getCookieGADS() {

    var gads = getCookie('__gads');
    return gads.split(':')[0].split('=')[1];

  }


  var globoId = getCADUNID();
  var iddfp = getCookieGADS();
  var idga = getCookie('_ga').match(/\d{2,}.{1}\d{2,}/)[0];

  console.log(globoId, iddfp, idga);

</script>

<script>

  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
  ga('create', 'UA-21942769-1', 'auto', {userId: globoId});
  ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
  ga('set', 'dimension3',globoId);
  ga('set', 'dimension4',iddfp);
  ga('set', 'dimension5',idga);
  ga('set', 'dimension6',dadosNavegg.gender);
  ga('set', 'dimension7',dadosNavegg.age);
  ga('set', 'dimension8',dadosNavegg.education);
  ga('set', 'dimension9',dadosNavegg.marital);
  ga('set', 'dimension10',dadosNavegg.income);
  ga('set', 'dimension11',dadosNavegg.interest);
  ga('set', 'dimension12',dadosNavegg.product);
  ga('set', 'dimension13',dadosNavegg.brand);
  ga('set', 'dimension14',dadosNavegg.career);
  ga('set', 'dimension15',dadosNavegg.country);
  ga('set', 'dimension16',dadosNavegg.region);
  ga('set', 'dimension17',dadosNavegg.city);
  ga('set', 'dimension18',dadosNavegg.cluster);
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>



    






    





    
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/mustache.js/mustache.min.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/_js/scripts.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/moment/min/moment-with-locales.min.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/moment/locale/pt-br.js"></script>
            <script>

                var srcSelo = 'http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/img/gq-selo-fixo-3.png';

                var resizeIframe = function(obj) {
                    var src = $(obj).attr('src');
                    $(obj).attr("style", "height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px")
                }

               function bannerContainerIframe(obj) {
                   var placeholder = '<div class="banner banner--vertical"><img src="'+srcSelo+'"></div>';
                   var src = $(obj).attr('src');
                    if($(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight < 600) {
                        $(obj).parents('.banner').parent().append(placeholder);
                    }
               }

               function bannerContainer($element) {

                    var placeholder = '<div class="banner banner--vertical"><img src="'+srcSelo+'"></div>';
                    if(!$element.is(':empty') && $element.height() <= 250) {
                        console.log($element.height());
                        $element.parent().append(placeholder);
                    }
               }

                
                    var urlServicosMenu = "/dinamico/filhas/gq/{{editorias}}/3/1/?servico=thumb_menu";
                
                $(document).ready(function() {
                    RevistaGQ.init(urlServicosMenu);
                });

               function handleBannerOverHighlight($bannerElement, $highlightElement, limitSize) {
                    if(!$bannerElement.is(':empty') && $bannerElement.height() > limitSize) {
                        $bannerElement.show();
                        $highlightElement.remove();
                    }
               }

            </script>


            <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    if (typeof glb !== 'undefined') {
                        var midiasEmbed = glb.midiasEmbeded;
                        if (midiasEmbed){
                            for (midia in midiasEmbed){
                                midiasEmbed[midia].videosIDs = WM.extractIdFromURL(midiasEmbed[midia].videosIDs);
                                new WM.Player({videosIDs:midiasEmbed[midia]}).attachTo(jQuery('#' + midia)[0]);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
            </script>

    h=document.head||document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0],s=document.createElement("script");
    s.type="text/javascript";
    s.src="/js/whatsapp-button.js";
    h.appendChild(s);
  }
</script>

<!-- Facebook save -->
<script>(function(d, s, id) {
  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/pt_BR/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.7";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>




<script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

    var editoria = "";

    })();

        _gaq.push(['_trackPageview',track]);
    }

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

	<div class="cf"></div>
    <style>
        #menuPrincipal ul.tabs-content {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        #menuPrincipal .alinhaSubMenus {
            width: 100%;
            float: left;
            border: 1px solid #DFDFDF;
            border-top: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            -moz-box-shadow: none;
            -webkit-box-shadow: none;
        }

        .menu-especiais {
            box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px #DFDFDF;
            -moz-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px #DFDFDF;
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px #DFDFDF;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            border: 1px solid #DFDFDF;
            border-top: none;
            padding: 5px;
            cursor: initial;
        }

        .menu-especiais-content {
            padding: 5px;
            background-color: #F7F9F8;
        }

        .menu-especiais-content div {
            display: inline-block;
        }
        .menu-especiais-content div a {
            color: #888888;
        }

    </style>
    <div class="menu-especiais">
        <div class="menu-especiais-content">

	<script type="text/javascript">
	    if ($("#menuPrincipal .tabs dd.active").length == 0) {
	        $("#menuPrincipal .tabs dd:first").addClass('active');

    <div class="cf slot-item first last">

	<dl class="tabs alinhaMenus menu-element">
	    
	        
	        
	    
	        
	        
	    
	        
	        
	    
	        
	            
	            
	            
	            <dd class="menu  btnCapa">
	                <a href="/capa" data-tab="capa">Capa</a>
	            </dd>
	        
	        
	    
	        
	        
	    
	        
	            
	            
	            
	            <dd class="menu  btnSuperFC">
	                <a href="/superfc" data-tab="superfc">SuperFC</a>
	            </dd>
	        
	        
	    
	        
	            
	            
	            
	            <dd class="menu  btnCidades">
	                <a href="/cidades" data-tab="cidades">Cidades</a>

				#menuPrincipal ul.tabs-content {

	<!-- Divs flutuantes -->
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>
	
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-login" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
	<form id="floatLoginForm" onsubmit="return false;" method="post">
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<div class="twelve column top">
				<div class="six column title">
					Entrar
				</div>
				<div class="six column">
					<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" class="close-login">	
				</div>
			</div>
			<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
			<div class="twelve column form-login">
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Email
                    <span style="color: #fff">
    
                        6</span></p>
					<input type="text" name="login_loginname" id="input-name" />
				</div>
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Senha</p>
					<input type="password" name="login_password" id="input-pass" />
				</div>
			</div>	
			<div class="twelve column form-more">
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="#" class="open-forgotten">Esqueci minha senha</a> 
				</div>
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="javascript:facebooklogin();" class="btn-fb" >
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-fb-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Facebook" title="Logar com Facebook" class="social-plugin bt-login-fb">	
					</a>
					<a href="javascript:twitterlogin();" class="btn-tw">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-tw-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Twitter" title="Logar com Twitter" class="social-plugin bt-login-tw">	
					</a>
					<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
				</div>
			</div> 
		</div>	
		<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
	</form>
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

    <div class="cf slot-item  ">
        






<div class="twelve columns top"><h5>Veja os filmes em cartaz</h5></div>
<div class="twelve columns busca-assunto" data-elemento="cinema-filtror">
    <div class="twelve columns info">
        <div class="twelve columns">
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left"">
                    <select id="PorFilme">
                        <option value="">-- Filmes --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <select id="PorGenero">
                        <option value="">-- Gêneros --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left">
                    <select id="PorCinema">
                        <option value="">-- Cinemas --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <input id="PalavraChave" placeholder="Palavra-chave" type="text" value="">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="twelve columns buscar-filme">
                <button id="BuscaFilme" class="btn">Buscar</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function abreFiltro() {
        var id = $(this).attr("id");
        var value = $(this).val();

        window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?" + id + "=" + value;
    }

    $("#BuscaFilme").click(function () {
        var valor = $("#PalavraChave").val();
        if (valor) {
            window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?busca=" + valor;
        }

        return false;
    });


    var $SELECTS = [$("#PorFilme"), $("#PorGenero"), $("#PorCinema")];

    var json = {"CinemaFiltros":{"PorFilme":{"Registro":[{"ID":"2864","Valor":"A Bela e a Fera"},{"ID":"2876","Valor":"A Grande Muralha"},{"ID":"2860","Valor":"Cinquenta Tons Mais Escuros"},{"ID":"2903","Valor":"Era o Hotel Cambridge"},{"ID":"2900","Valor":"Fragmentado"},{"ID":"2895","Valor":"Hiroshima, Meu Amor"},{"ID":"2890","Valor":"Insubstitu\u00edvel"},{"ID":"2875","Valor":"Internet - O Filme"},{"ID":"2888","Valor":"Kong: A Ilha da Caveira"},{"ID":"2865","Valor":"Lego Batman - O Filme"},{"ID":"2873","Valor":"Lion - Uma Jornada para Casa"},{"ID":"2878","Valor":"Logan"},{"ID":"2881","Valor":"Moonlight: Sob a Luz do Luar"},{"ID":"2897","Valor":"O Filho de Joseph"},{"ID":"2896","Valor":"Pedro Osmar, Pra Liberdade Que Se Conquista"},{"ID":"2902","Valor":"Power Rangers"},{"ID":"2901","Valor":"T2 Trainspotting"},{"ID":"2827","Valor":"Tinha que Ser Ele? (*)"}]},"PorGenero":{"Registro":[{"ID":"1","Valor":"A\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"2","Valor":"Anima\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Aventura"},{"ID":"4","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia Dram\u00e1tica"},{"ID":"6","Valor":"Document\u00e1rio"},{"ID":"7","Valor":"Drama"},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Drama \/ Romance"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Fantasia"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Suspense"}]},"PorCinema":{"Registro":[{"ID":"14","Valor":"Belas"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Betim "},{"ID":"2","Valor":"BH Shopping (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Big"},{"ID":"681","Valor":"Boulevard"},{"ID":"299","Valor":"Cidade"},{"ID":"686","Valor":"Contagem"},{"ID":"10","Valor":"Del Rey"},{"ID":"11","Valor":"Diamond Mall (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"683","Valor":"Esta\u00e7\u00e3o BH"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Ita\u00fa Power Shopping"},{"ID":"12","Valor":"Minas Shopping"},{"ID":"688","Valor":"Monte Carmo "},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Norte"},{"ID":"15","Valor":"Pampulha Mall"},{"ID":"18","Valor":"Paragem"},{"ID":"687","Valor":"Partage Shopping Betim"},{"ID":"8","Valor":"P\u00e1tio Savassi (Cinemark)"},{"ID":"21","Valor":"Ponteio"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Via Shopping"}]}}};
    var cf = json.CinemaFiltros;

    for (var i in $SELECTS) {
        var $select = $SELECTS[i];
        $select.on("change", abreFiltro);
        var id = $select.attr("id");

        var dados = cf[id].Registro;

        for (var j in dados) {
            var item = dados[j];

            var $option = $("<option value='" + item.ID + "'>" + item.Valor + "</option>")

            $select.append($option);
        }
    }

    $("#PorFilme").val("");
    $("#PorGenero").val("");
    $("#PorCinema").val("");


</script>

    </div>

}

<script type="text/javascript">

  $(document).ready(function(){
        $("a[rel^='prettyPhotoIMP'] img").prettyPhoto();
  });

  function openPrettyPhotoIMP(el) {
    var src = $(el).data('image-full');
    $.prettyPhoto.open(src);
  }
</script>

                        <!-- Lista - Ultimas -->

	                                            <div class="seven columns">
	                                                <p class="cidades"><a href="/cidades/suspeito-de-estuprar-adolescente-na-pra%C3%A7a-da-liberdade-%C3%A9-preso-1.1452795">REGIÃO CENTRO-SUL DE BH</a></p>
	
	                                                <h3><a href="/cidades/suspeito-de-estuprar-adolescente-na-pra%C3%A7a-da-liberdade-%C3%A9-preso-1.1452795">Suspeito de estuprar adolescente na praça da Liberdade é preso</a></h3>
	                                            </div>
	                                            <div class="five columns">
	                                                
	                                                <a href="/cidades/suspeito-de-estuprar-adolescente-na-pra%C3%A7a-da-liberdade-%C3%A9-preso-1.1452795"><img src="/polopoly_fs/1.1452540.1490560249!image/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/sidebar-writer-fit/image.jpg" alt=""/></a>
	                                            </div>
	                                        </div>
	
	                                    
	
	                                    
	                                

                                
                                    
									
									
									
                                    
									
	                                    
	                                    
	
	                                    
	                                    
	                                        
	                                        
	                                        
	                                            
	                                        
	                                        
	                                    
	                                    
	
	                                        <div class="twelve column">
	                                            <div class="seven columns">
	                                                <p class="cidades"><a href="/cidades/jovem-%C3%A9-espancado-at%C3%A9-a-morte-pelo-ex-marido-da-namorada-no-sul-de-mg-1.1452772">BOA ESPERANÇA</a></p>

  }

<script>
          $(function(){

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);
           
              var loadDone = false;
              onLoadDone = function() {
                  if (loadDone) {
                      $("#prf-loadhide").fadeOut(250);
                  } else {
                      loadDone = true;
                  }
              };
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.ready(onLoadDone);
              onLoadDone();
  
              Polopoly.ContextMenu.init();
            }
            
            $("#navigation #ATF_center_300x250").remove();
           
            
        });
</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var googletag = googletag || {};
		googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
		(function() {
			var gads = document.createElement('script');
			gads.async = true;
			gads.type = 'text/javascript';
			var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
			gads.src = (useSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') +
			'//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js';
			var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
		})();
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

					<li class="single-menu-phone cidades inative">
					
						Cidades 
						
							<img alt="seta de navegação" src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/mobile/ico-arrow-down-phone.png" class="arrow-nav" >

							<li><a href="/cidades">Cidades</a></li>

	<!-- Divs flutuantes -->
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>
	
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-login" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
	<form id="floatLoginForm" onsubmit="return false;" method="post">
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<div class="twelve column top">
				<div class="six column title">
					Entrar
				</div>
				<div class="six column">
					<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" class="close-login">	
				</div>
			</div>
			<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
			<div class="twelve column form-login">
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Email
                    <span style="color: #fff">
    
                        5</span></p>
					<input type="text" name="login_loginname" id="input-name" />
				</div>
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Senha</p>
					<input type="password" name="login_password" id="input-pass" />
				</div>
			</div>	
			<div class="twelve column form-more">
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="#" class="open-forgotten">Esqueci minha senha</a> 
				</div>
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="javascript:facebooklogin();" class="btn-fb" >
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-fb-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Facebook" title="Logar com Facebook" class="social-plugin bt-login-fb">	
					</a>
					<a href="javascript:twitterlogin();" class="btn-tw">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-tw-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Twitter" title="Logar com Twitter" class="social-plugin bt-login-tw">	
					</a>
					<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
				</div>
			</div> 
		</div>	
		<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
	</form>
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

	
	

	<!-- ATF - inicio -->
	
	
		




<div class="row panel hide-for-small">
    <div id="widget-top">
        
        
                
    
  
    
  
  
            
    </div>
</div>

<div class="row panel" id="atf-article">
    

    <div class="eight columns">
        
        
        
                
    
  
    
  
    
    
    <div class="cf slot-item first last">
        









    
    


<style type="text/css">
    #lista-galerias {

    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto {
        background-color: #004525;
        height: 80px;
        padding: 10px;
    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto.super-fc {
        background-color: #8bb34b;
    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto.diversao {
        background-color: #f67529;
    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto.cidades {
        background-color: #a91b25;
    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto.interessa {
        background-color: #0faeac;
    }

    #lista-galerias .container-texto a {
        color: #fff;
    }

    #lista-galerias img {
        display: block;
    }

    #lista-galerias .titulo {
        line-height: 1;
    }

    #lista-galerias.block-grid.two-up > li{
        width:49%;
        padding: 0 0 15px 15px;
    }

    #lista-galerias .box .chamada-box-multimidia {
        background: url("/img/sempre-editora/layout/bg-chamada-multimidia.png");
        border-top-left-radius: 5px;
        border-top-right-radius: 5px;
        z-index: 3;
        margin: 0;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 10px;
        padding-top: 6px;
        padding-right: 3px;
        width: 280px;
        height: 56px;
    }

    #lista-galerias .box .chamada-box-multimidia .ico {
        border-right: 1px dotted #AFAFAF;
        height: 45px;
        width: 75px;
    }

    #lista-galerias .box.super-fc .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-superfc.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.diversao .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-diversao.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.interessa .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-interessa.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.cidades .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-cidade.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.brasil .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-brasil.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.economia .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-economia.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.mundo .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-mundo.png) center center no-repeat; }
    #lista-galerias .box.politica .chamada-box-multimidia .ico{ background:url(/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-main-galeria-politica.png) center center no-repeat; }

    #lista-galerias .box .chamada-box-multimidia .text-chamada {
        padding-left: 8px;
        font-family: "UnitWeb-Bold";
        font-size: 16px;
        color: #000;
        line-height: 1.3;
        height: 40px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
    @media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
        #lista-galerias .box .chamada-box-multimidia { width: 90%; }
    }

</style>

    padding-left: 15px;

<script>
          $(function(){

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);
           
              var loadDone = false;
              onLoadDone = function() {
                  if (loadDone) {
                      $("#prf-loadhide").fadeOut(250);
                  } else {
                      loadDone = true;
                  }
              };
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.ready(onLoadDone);
              onLoadDone();
  
              Polopoly.ContextMenu.init();
            }
            
            $("#navigation #ATF_center_300x250").remove();
           
            
        });
</script>
